nl.tue.fingerpaint.server.simulator

Class NativeCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.fingerpaint.server.simulator.NativeCommunicator

  •  class NativeCommunicator
extends Object
    Class that is able to communicate with the native simulation-service code. Use this class only indirectly through SimulatorService
    Author:
    Group Fingerpaint

      • getInstance

        public static NativeCommunicator getInstance()
        Return the singleton instance of this class.
        Returns:

      • simulate

        public double simulate(String geometry,
              String mixer,
              double[] concentrationVector,
              double stepSize,
              String stepName)
        Communicates with the native simulation-service code to simulate a step on a given concentration vector. The given vector is modified with the result.
        Parameters:
        geometry - The geometry used for the simulation
        mixer - The mixer used for the simulation
        concentrationVector - The concentration vector that used for the simulation; note that results are returned in this parameter
        stepSize - The size of the step that is performed
        stepName - The name of the step to simulate
        Returns:
        The segregation of the simulation
